data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: When Erin faced the mirror, she was crestfallen by her reflection. The ____ was ____ to ____ subtle, but ____ was ____ ghoulish ____ sultry. She ____ pinned ____ hopes ____ her ____, ____ she ____ a ____ of ____ to ____ fate. She supposed this ugly duckling would never be a swan.

She h__ pinned ma__ hopes o_ her transfo_______, b__ she fe__ a se___ of resig______ to h__ fate. She supposed this ugly duckling would never be a swan.
data.answer: 当艾琳面对镜子时，她对自己的映像感到沮丧。她的装扮本应该是很微妙的，但她看起来更残忍而不是性感。她对自己的转变寄托了许多希望，但她感到对自己的命运听天由命。她猜想这只丑小鸭永远不会成为一只天鹅。
